title: 'The Late, Great Hannibal Lecter'
summary: Trump repeatedly praised Hannibal Lecter - the fictional cannibal serial killer from 'Silence of the Lambs' - calling him 'a wonderful man' and 'the late, great Hannibal Lecter' at rallies.
keyFacts: Repeatedly praised Hannibal Lecter - the fictional cannibal serial killer from 'Silence of the Lambs'
'The late, great Hannibal Lecter... he's a wonderful man'
Hannibal Lecter is not a real person and didn't die (because he never existed)
Used this as part of immigration discussion somehow
Repeated the reference at multiple rallies throughout 2024
